## SendableLiquity.withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw DebtToken from Stability Deposit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, StabilityDepositChangeDetails>>>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [StabilityDepositChangeDetails](./lib-base.stabilitydepositchangedetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [ProtocolToken reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.protocoltokenreward.md)<!-- -->.
